directory.description: A directory where the library is placed.
directory.x-prompt: Which directory do you want to create the library in?

tags.description: Comma separated list of tags to be applied to the project (used for linting).

publishable.description: Whether the library is intended to be distributed.

importPath.description: The path used to import the library, like `@myorg/my-awesome-lib`. Must be a valid npm name and must be provided when creating a publishable library.
